trends: There has been one other sighting in Camden
There were no other sightings in Camden on or around July 20th 2011
Summary: gray metalic disk with red lights going clockwise on bottom hovering then flew away very fast
divs: sighting detailson july 20 at aproxamatly 7:30 pm my two boys and me was outside playing badmitton. my oldest son had went to pick the little birdy up off the ground that goes to the badmitton,and he happened to have looked up in the sky and noticed this unique flying type saucer up in the sky and he had pointed it out to me and said look momma that looks like a flying boat.the reason he said that is because, my husnand had made a boat\kyak that looked just like this thing in the sky.we just couldn't stop looking at it.we had never seen nothing like it before and we was trying to figure out what it was.it like huverd over the top of the tree for i say like half a minute and it had red ligths on the bottom and the lights went clockwise.well it aventually left the area.it flew off so fast.we were not scared at all by this.it was actually neat to see this object.i never really belived in ufo's and stuff,but every since i saw this flying saucer type thing in the sky it has changed my belief in it.
